directions: Combine peaches, bananas, lemon verbena, coconut milk, and lime juice in a blender; blend until smooth. If too thick, add water until mixture reaches desired consistency.
Add ice cubes to 2 tall glasses and pour peach mixture on top. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon water, or more if needed  (Optional)
title: Vegan Peach-Banana-Coconut Smoothie
